item.title: Seeking Experienced PHP Developer (North Berkeley Area)
item.description:
We are a small, dynamic company with a strong development team, maintaining and enhancing an enterprise-class web application. Our software is the leading tool in its market segment with a user base that is growing quickly. This is a rare opportunity to work in a great environment where you will have the chance to work with a motivated (yet genial) programming and management team.

Our product uses PHP, AJAX and JavaScript to implement a compelling business solution for our customers nation wide.

Position Description:

An experienced software professional is needed to contribute towards the development and maintenance of a commercial web-based application supporting real-time transactions with major corporations. Responsibilities include the design, support and implementation of database-driven web applications in PHP. This is a full-time position.

Qualifications:

 2 years of college preferred, but technical degree not required
 2 years minimum PHP development.
 Proficient in: PHP4 & PHP5, SQL, JavaScript (AJAX), and HTML/XHTML
 Experience with XML, XSL, CSS, RPC, and MSSQL Server helpful

Benefits:

We offer an excellent, highly competitive salary package commensurate with experience and qualifications, along with full benefits.

Important Note: Current residence in the San Francisco Bay Area is required. Job is in the North Berkeley area.
item.dc:title: Seeking Experienced PHP Developer (North Berkeley Area)
